page.title: 06Home Life-weekday
page.content: {A typical weekday-The Young family The Young household rise at 7.30 a.m.Having breakfasted Mr.Young and his daughter{travel into Hitchin}by bus where the latter goes to school. From here Mr.Young{travels by train to {London.Meanwhile,Mrs.Young}from about 9.30-3.30 attends a Design and Fashion course at Hitchin College.At about 3.45 she collects her child from school and having returned home starts to prepare the dinner.At 7.00 p.m Mrs Young drives to{Hitchin Station}to meet her husband. At 7.30 the Young family have supper.Following this,Rosie goes upstairs to do homework;Mrs.Young retreats to the kitchen to do the washing up and Mr.Young either relaxes in front of the T.V or goes to visit a friend.Finally{the family retreat to {their respective bedrooms at 11.00 .
